title: Comic book reading among young people in the UK 2015 , by demographic
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Demographics.
The maximum Share of respondents 34.0 is found at Demographic Boys and the minimum is found at KS5 where Demographic is 14.4.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Demographic is 19.6.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Demographic, and Share of respondents in each Demographic on the y axis.
Demographic Boys has the highest Share of respondents and KS5 has the lowest Share of respondents.
